participants.name: Renae Vaules, SPHR
participants.title: Director of Human Resources at Care1st Health Plan - Arizona

messages.message: What makes you different from every other marketing company?

Hi, Brian - Grateful is a media company that is poised to be the fastest growing media company for quite awhile.  We are a start up but with the backing of a billion dollar company.  Kyle's explanation  is this:  "We are embracing old newspapers +digital+ cutting edge tech, machine learning, voice controlled devices, etc.  We are fun and will be taking on the world while being grateful".  Does that sound interesting to you?
What are you most grateful for?
Personally, I am grateful for my son.  He was born 3 months early.
Wow, that's a good one. I wish I had kids.
I can appreciate that answer.  Honesty can be hard to come by in business sometimes.
I've been in HR for over 20 years.  I will tell you nothing destroys your character and credibility faster than dishonesty.
